## Converters.templatedJson() function

Helper function which creates a new [JsonConverter](./ts-json.jsonconverter.md) which converts an `unknown` value to JSON, rendering any property names or string values using mustache with the supplied context. See the mustache documentation for details of mustache syntax and view.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function templatedJson(options?: Partial<TemplatedJsonConverterOptions>): JsonConverter;
```

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ [Options and context](./ts-json.templatedjsonconverteroptions.md) for the conversion.


</td></tr>

[JsonConverter](./ts-json.jsonconverter.md)
